## Brainstorm Session

To start the brainstorm session, comment below with:
```
@feature-brainstorm Let's explore this feature: [your feature description]
```

## Brainstorm Checklist

Work through these phases with @feature-brainstorm:
- [ ] Phase 1: Problem Understanding
- [ ] Phase 2: Solution Exploration
- [ ] Phase 3: Impact Analysis
- [ ] Phase 4: Success Definition

## After Brainstorming

Once the brainstorm is complete:
1. ✅ Update this issue with the final summary
2. ✅ Tag relevant systems (combat/progression/economy)
3. ✅ Create implementation PR: `@copilot create a pull request to [implement refined feature] in mardin101/rising-force-offline`
4. ✅ Link this brainstorm issue in the PR description
